import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AuthContext } from "../Context/AuthContext"; import { Button } from "@material-ui/core"; const NavBar = () => { const { isAuthenticated, user } = React.useContext(AuthContext); return (
Learning Made Easy
{isAuthenticated ? (
  • Home
  • Courses
) : (
  • Home
  • Signin
  • Register
)} {/*
*/}
); }; export default NavBar;
